doc.previous: There have been widely divergent views on Khayy m At one end of the spectrum there are nightclubs named after Khayy m and he is seen as an agnostic hedonist 40 On the other end of the spectrum he is seen as a mystical Sufi poet influenced by platonic traditions
doc.after: Christopher Hitchens for instance identifies Khayy m as a skeptic whose poetry was satirizing the claims and practices of religion 41
